字幕内容: Night – Indoors – Qi Yan is practicing calligraphy
Qi Yan: Why are you here

字幕颜色: this subject was just copying poems to meditate.

字幕内容: Nangong Jingnu: The birds and fish are still
字幕颜色: the moon is reflected on the dark river.
all that remains is a qin on the boat…

字幕内容: Nangong Jingnu: The south has sent in a new batch of folding fans for tribute.
Emperor Father had some delivered to the estate.
I remembered that you like things like this
字幕颜色: so I was waiting for you to come and take your pick.

字幕内容: I didn’t think you would stay in the study for more than two hours

字幕颜色: so I came to get you.

字幕内容: Qi Yan: This subject appreciates the thought
I’ve already picked a fan that I like.
I want… I want you to write something on it for me.
Qi Yan: Oh… So you had a plan
You weren’t waiting for me to choose
字幕颜色: you just wanted me to write something for you?

字幕内容: Nangong Jingnu: I’m not… Qi Yan! You’re teasing me
Qi Yan: This subject wouldn’t dare. This subject will abide by your orders.

字幕颜色: let’s go. I’m in a good mood today.

字幕内容: I’ll get the storage opened and have my collection of folding fans brought out later.
We’ll see if there’s any matching ones.

字幕颜色: Your Highness. Allow this subject to tidy up the table.
I’ll wait for you in the front hall!
